This notebook display the generated quantities of each model, with no data imput

```{r}
# Import libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(rstan)
library(tidybayes)
setwd("~/PostDoc/RNAseq-noise-model")
```

Setting data

```{r}

N = 100
G = 100
counts =  matrix(rep(1, N*G), ncol = G)
my_prior = c(0,5)
omit_data = 1
exposure = 1e6

```

Simulate data from Multinomial model

```{r}

# Fit model
multinomial_model = stan_model("stan/multinomial.stan")
multinomial_fit = sampling(multinomial_model, cores = 4)

# Check fit and plot
multinomial_gen = 
  multinomial_fit %>% 
  { 
    (.) %>% check_all_diagnostics()
    (.)
  } %>% 
  gather_samples(counts_gen[N, G]) 

# Plot
multinomial_gen %>%
  filter(.iteration== 1 & .chain == 1) %>%
  ggplot(aes(estimate)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  scale_x_log10()

```
